objects.description: In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0007) sent spearphishing attachments to three energy distribution companies containing malware to gain access to victim systems.(Citation: DOJ Sandworm Team October 2020)

external_references.description: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA. (2020, October 15). Indictment: Conspiracy to Commit an Offense Against the United States. Retrieved April 7, 2021.
